overview:
Tom Richards manages a car insurance website, Best Car Coverage, that is centered on helping people manage their car insurance risk.

Since each individual will carry their own unique risk based on different characteristics, such as age, income and wealth, it is important to review needs based on the risk profile you carry. Best Car Coverage is focused on helping car owners manage their car insurance risk based on the risk profile they carry. There is in depth details on making sure the right coverage is carried as well as tips to help find affordable pricing.

Tom Richards has used his 15 years of risk management experience building easy to use information on how consumers can make sure they have the proper information to manage their driving risk. Tom has over 10 years direct experience working in the insurance industry and has a vast amount of experience on how insurance companies operate.
